control.name: power_state
control.doc: Used to turn the DUT off and on

control.name: jtag_vref_sel0
control.doc: usbpd_uart_vref_sel0

control.name: jtag_vref_sel1
control.doc: usbpd_uart_vref_sel1

control.name: uart4_pty
control.doc: Psuedo-terminal (pty) thats connnected to USB PD MCU's uart console

control.name: ec3po_usbpd_uart_pty
control.doc: USBPD UART console provided via EC-3PO console interpreter.

control.name: usbpd_ec3po_interp_connect
control.doc: State indicating if interpreter is listening to the EC UART.

control.name: uart4_baudrate
control.doc: Baudrate for CPU's uart console

control.name: uart4_parity
control.doc: Parity for CPU's uart console

control.name: uart4_sbits
control.doc: Number of stop bits for CPU's uart console

control.name: uart4_bits
control.doc: Number of data bits for CPU's uart console

control.name: usbpd_uart_cmd
control.doc: Set to send command to USBPD UART. Get to obtain the matched results with the regular expression of usbpd_uart_regexp.

control.name: usbpd_uart_multicmd
control.doc: Set to send multiple commands to USB PD UART.

control.name: usbpd_uart_regexp
control.doc: List of regular expressions to match the response of usbpd_uart_cmd.

control.name: usbpd_uart_timeout
control.doc: Timeout value for a response after issuing a command on usbpd_uart_cmd.

control.name: usbpd_uart_capture
control.doc: Enables capture of USB PD console via usbpd_uart_stream

control.name: usbpd_uart_stream
control.doc: USB PD console stream captured while usbpd_uart_capture is set to 'on'

control.name: uart4_en
control.doc: Enabled JTAG buffer on servo ... re-purposed to uart4.

control.name: uart4_on_flex_en
control.doc: Enables JTAG buffer on servo flex ... repurposed to uart4.

control.name: ec_chip
control.doc: EC chip name (read-only)

control.name: usbpd_chip
control.doc: USB PD chip name (read-only)
